# Wings of Flurry (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Area:** 30-ft.-radius burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Races of the Dragon (WotC), pg 119

*Immense, scaled wings unfurl from behind you and beat at nearby foes in a savage flurry before vanishing as quickly as they appeared.*

You evoke flickering dragonâ€™s wings that strike at every target in range, dealing 1d6 points of damage per caster level to all designated targets within 30 feet that fail a Reflex saving throw and half that damage to creatures that succeed on the save.

Creatures that fail the Reflex save are also [[Dazed|dazed]] for 1 round.

*Special:* A dragonblooded character, or a character with the dragon type, casts this spell at +1 caster level.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Wizard 4 to Level.
